price: (Ergamaa) abbaa humnaa ta'e, kan Gooftaa Arshii biratti iddoo jabaa qabu.
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
